item.title: [GRA/BHS][Web Hosting] - TLS Maintenance
item.description:
May 2, 07:14 UTC
Update - The maintenance has been completed for Cluster020, Cluster012 and Cluster051.

The current maintenance will be implemented for the clusters mentioned below on the 03/05/2023:

-Cluster021
-Cluster022
-Cluster010
-Cluster011
-Cluster023

An update will be posted before the beginning of the maintenance.

May 2, 06:32 UTC
In progress - The current maintenance has started for Cluster020, Cluster012 and Cluster051.

May 2, 06:28 UTC
Update - The current maintenance will start today for Cluster020, Cluster012 and Cluster051 at 07:00 UTC.

Apr 25, 11:16 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Apr 24, 23:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/05/2023 10:24 UTC
End time : 16/05/2023 10:24 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our product security management for you and your visitors, we will remove TLS versions 1.0 and TLS 1.1 from our web hosting and CDN services. This will leave only TLS 1.2 and TLS 1.3 versions active, which have been deemed compliant by CNIL in terms of data security.
No action is required from you â€” neither on your Web Hosting plan, nor on your CDN.
We will update this task during the proposed timeline.

Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, Console User Interface, Git and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours.
